content: I doubt that when history books survey the shocking events of November 2016  they will spare many words for the U.S. Supreme Court’s announcement late Thursday that it had dismissed a pair of cases involving credit card networks and ATM fees ranks. But for lawyers in the elite ranks of the Supreme Court bar  the justices’ order – which said that Visa  MasterCard and bank members of credit card networks had changed their argument after persuading the court to take their case -- create
